import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Header.css" import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" const Headers = () => { const [userdata, setUserdata] = useState({}); console.log("response", userdata) const getUser = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:6005/login/sucess", { withCredentials: true }); setUserdata(response.data.user) } catch (error) { console.log("error", error) } } useEffect(() => { getUser() }, []) return ( <>

Harsh Pathak
